sql:
SELECT
  id,
  argMax(name, time) AS name,
  groupArrayInsertAt(
    0,
    toUInt32(dateDiff('year', toDate('2015-1-1'), toDate('2016-12-1'))) + 1)(ROUND(bus_factor, 2),
    toUInt32(dateDiff('year', toStartOfYear(toDate('2015-1-1')), time))) AS bus_factor,
  groupArrayInsertAt(
    [],
    toUInt32(dateDiff('year', toDate('2015-1-1'), toDate('2016-12-1'))) + 1)(detail,
    toUInt32(dateDiff('year', toStartOfYear(toDate('2015-1-1')), time))) AS detail,
  groupArrayInsertAt(
    0,
    toUInt32(dateDiff('year', toDate('2015-1-1'), toDate('2016-12-1'))) + 1)(ROUND(total_contributions, 2),
    toUInt32(dateDiff('year', toStartOfYear(toDate('2015-1-1')), time))) AS total_contributions
FROM
(
  SELECT
    time,
    id,
    any(name) AS name,
    SUM(count) AS total_contributions,
    length(detail) AS bus_factor,
    arrayFilter(x -> tupleElement(x, 2) >= quantileExactWeighted(0.5)(count, count), arrayMap((x, y) -> (x, y), groupArray(actor_login), groupArray(count))) AS detail
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      toStartOfYear(created_at) AS time,
      org_id AS id, argMax(org_login, time) AS name,
      
          
    if(type='PullRequestEvent' AND action='closed' AND pull_merged=1, issue_author_id, actor_id) AS actor_id,
    argMax(if(type='PullRequestEvent' AND action='closed' AND pull_merged=1, issue_author_login, actor_login), created_at) AS actor_login,
    countIf(type='IssueCommentEvent' AND action='created') AS issue_comment,
    countIf(type='IssuesEvent' AND action='opened')  AS open_issue,
    countIf(type='PullRequestEvent' AND action='opened') AS open_pull,
    countIf(type='PullRequestReviewCommentEvent' AND action='created') AS review_comment,
    countIf(type='PullRequestEvent' AND action='closed' AND pull_merged=1) AS merged_pull,
    sqrt(1*issue_comment + 2*open_issue + 3*open_pull + 4*review_comment + 2*merged_pull) AS activity
,
          toUInt32(ceil(activity)) AS count
          
    FROM gh_events
    WHERE type IN ('IssuesEvent', 'IssueCommentEvent', 'PullRequestEvent', 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent') AND (org_id IN [1342004]) AND  created_at >= toDate('2015-1-1') AND created_at < dateAdd(month, 1, toDate('2016-12-1'))
    GROUP BY id, time, actor_id
    HAVING actor_login NOT LIKE '%[bot]'
  )
  GROUP BY id, time
  
)
GROUP BY id
ORDER BY bus_factor[-1] DESC
    LIMIT 3
